name: SPC Infosoft Pvt Ltd
description: SPC Infosoft Pvt. Ltd is a leading BPO c
overview:
SPC Infosoft Pvt Ltd is one of the fastest growing travel businesses in India. We are young yet have three brands under our belt namely The Globe Hunters, Travel High Street and Fly and Save. Our specialization in BPO, Call Center (Inbound/Outbound), Online Marketing, Accounting & Taxation, Telemarketing and Transcription Services discerns us from typical Travel Agencies.

The Globe Hunters specializes in holiday packages, travel deals, cheap air fares to worldwide destinations, tailor-made itineraries, hotel only, tours and car hire. The website offers most competitive prices of holidays and flights.

Travel High Street is an ultimate destination to find the best holiday deals. This is the brand that offers Cuba all inclusive stays, luxurious Maldives escapes, relaxed Jamaican holiday, never ending Barbados extravaganza and fun for the family in Orlando.

Fly and Save is gradually becoming one of the most sought after alternatives to book flights from UK while saving hefty amount of money. Browse through best available flights on the market while booking your travel arrangements with Fly and Save.
